cohort_rule: At each participating school, all students enrolled in grades 4–12 at the time are invited at each wave; grade cohorts may vary as students enrol or leave (moving/graduation).
baseline_collection_window: 28 Sep 2022 – 28 Feb 2023 (across three cities with different windows).
source_ref: Findings, p.1; Study design, p.2; Recruitment dates, p.3
